entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entry ClearButton does not clear the text? #9954
  • FilePicker: Not possible to pick a file on an iPad-Pro Simulator with iOS 15.5 #9953
    Backlog
  • Border control for image with rounded corners doesnt work on iOS #9952
    Backlog
  • namespace wth SecureStorage #9951
  • Button only displays first line of multiline text #9949
    Backlog
  • Shell in WinUI layout bugged #9941
    Backlog
  • Image gets scaled over another view. #9939
    Backlog
  • Shell crashes upon adding/removing items #9938
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] Frame with an Entry causes app to freeze #9937
  • Using XF renderer in .NET MAUI not possible -> System.InvalidCastException: 'Specified cast is not valid.' #9936
    Backlog
  • RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand inside CollectionView does not get triggered on windows platform #9935
    Backlog
  • Fail to install MAUI with error "Workload installation failed: microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.android-arm::6.0.9 is not found in NuGet feeds" #9934
  • Data Binding not working #9932
    Backlog
  • [Feature Request] Printing UI for MAUI Windows/Android/iOS #9931
    Backlog

Closed

  • Please update the viewhandler document #7435
  • Toolbar with Tabbed Pages in shell #5504
  • Startup projecft targets platform 'Android'. Entity Framework Core Package Manager Console Tools don't support this platform #9940
  • Maui.Storage.Preferences.Get when supplied with default value still returns null #9945
  • Elements in same layout doesn't response IsVisible changes [iOS][Mac] #7482
    Backlog
  • MAUI Not request permission of nearby device on Android #9929

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix root page swapping #9955
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending Core xml comments #9950
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Rename W2DImage to PlatformImage #9948
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Update Extensions inline docs #9946
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Align GraphicsView Background behavior between platforms #9944
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Update Dispatcher inline docs #9943
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix crash opening Shell app via notification tray #9933
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, high
  • [net6.0][Core]Fixes wrong declared CommandMapper types #9930
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨, .NET 6 + Servicing

Merged

  • Revert "Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0" #9942
  • Shorten the msi filenames #9915
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Update docs animations #9746
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22451.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22452.2 #9922
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Update GridExtensions.cs to compatible with Xamarin #9891
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Remove pipelines check #9914
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • First load absolute image paths before trying drawables #9926
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 6 + Servicing
  • Fix TypeConverters API Docs #9780
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fixes DatePicker format #9924
    community ✨
  • Correctly layout the WebView #9923
    .NET 6 + Servicing
